original_text: They are to spread a scarlet cloth over them, cover that with the durable leather and put the poles in place.
korean_text: 홍색 보자기를 그 위에 펴고 그것을 해달의 가죽 덮개로 덮은 후에 그 채를 꿰고

sentences.original_text: They are to spread a scarlet cloth over them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그것들 위에 주홍색 천을 펼쳐야 합니다

sentences.original_text: cover that with the durable leather
and put the poles in place
